title: How can phone review YouTubers afford the phones they review? Doesn't YouTube pay little nowadays? - Quora

response.answer_text: This can happen a couple different ways: If they’re a larger YouTuber who gets a lot of views it’s possible that the company that owns the phone sponsors them and gives them the phone for free to review.Also on that, if they’re a large YouTuber, and get a lot of views, they probably make enough money to afford the phones.YouTube pays out an average of $1 for every thousand views (that watch ads), meaning if they get an average of 100K views per video, that’s $100-ish dollars. Minus whatever YouTube’s cut is.
